features.featureTitle: Update ONLY the selected Home page hero headline span element (XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h1[1]/span[1]`, implemented in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`) to animate its text with a typing effect that cycles through the words `Planning` → `Precision` → `Performance`, deleting each complete word with a backspace effect before typing the next, and repeating this loop continuously. Do not change the span’s existing font, size, Tailwind classes, or color styling.
